div3.head: Object
div3.p: Provides elements for general-purpose object inclusion; this includes images and other media, as well as executable content.

tr.td:
Object indicates a non-text item for inclusion in the document; this includes images and other media, as well as executable content which require plugins or external applications to process.
Note this is the way images are referenced in this language, rather than through the legacy img/@src
Param elements specify a set of values that may be required to process the object data by an object handler at run-time
